title: Psychoactive
subject_group: Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Anatomy
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Body, Human
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Drug abuse
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Drugs - Research
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Physiology
description: Surveys the effects of psychoactive drugs on the nine systems of the human body, and demonstrates how each system functions and how a drug intended for one body system throws the others into disequilibrium. Based on research and practical experience at the San Francisco Drug Detoxification and Rehabilitation Project.
